aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.body: Igrev is the best partner in Korea that can provide excellent value to customers in the field of website construction - system construction - system operation - providing online/mobile shopping mall solutions in website construction based on technical know-how from many years of experience, starting with professional web site production. I am proud of myself.

aboutUs.title: technology
aboutUs.body: From IT consulting to FullStack development (Web, Application, Back Office), planning (project management, branding, E-commerce), new technology R&D development (artificial intelligence, block chain), cross-platform application development, technology consulting, UX & UI design, We are expanding our presence in various fields such as SEO.

aboutUs.title: future vision
aboutUs.body: With the beginning of the 4th industry, programming is fundamental and is used in so many places that there is no missing place. We create a better world to live in by solving industrial and social problems using technology, and dream of a human-centered knowledge innovation future through a system that can know what everyone doesn't know . We will always listen to the voice of our customers and fulfill our role as a company that will lead society through the development of new technologies that will take responsibility for the future.
